name: #86D1DC
description:
This is a game I made for a 48h game jam at our university during autumn 2018. The theme of the game jam was #86D1DC.

My main goal was to try out something new. I ended up trying to make an isometric game and to make the art I tried a new piece of software called Marmoset Hexels 3.

Controls:
Arrow keys - move
R - restart level
